section.name: Overview
section.p: This project was started because I was in need of this feature for my program, but I could not find a suitable openSource option. The main problem was my desire to limit the range of selectable dates. So I built my own, and have released it in case anyone else has the same requirements that I did.

dl.dd: moved example program from test jar into main jar and made main jar executable such that the sample program is invoked if the jar file is executed

ul.li: Provided applet support for demo program
